question:
Which of the following is / are correct statements with respect to the Dairy Processing & Infrastructure Development Fund (DIDF)?
  1. This fund is co-managed by NABARD and NDDB {National Dairy Development Board}
  2. The fund money will be used to lend cheap loans to borrowers in dairy sector such as Milk Unions and Milk Cooperatives
  3. Corpus of this fund is Rs. 10,881 crore
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: This fund is co-managed by NABARD and NDDB This is incorrect statement. It is to be managed by NDDB which in turn will use the National Dairy Development Cooperation (NCDC) to disburse the loan. NABARD is providing huge chunk of this fund as loan to NDDB. The fund money will be used to lend cheap loans to borrowers in dairy sector such as Milk Unions and Milk Cooperatives This is correct statement. Rate of interest is 6.5% Corpus of this fund is Rs. 10,881 crore This is correct statement. Reference Link
